page.title: 18HEALTH AND WELFARE
page.content: There is a Health Centre in the village of Uffculme which is served by four doctors. There is often a nurse and a Health Visitor at this site to help and advise people about health and social problems also. Prescribed medicene can be obtained from the Pharmacy here. Unfortunately there is no chemist in the Village and the nearest is Cullomton. The elderly are fairly well catered for. At Culm Haven there are a number of houses for elderly people, some being single and others for married couples. These are linked through an intercom to a resident warden who will come to assist if anyone is in trouble. This scheme is operated by the Council and there is a similar private scheme at 'Markers'. This scheme was developed by Uffculme Housing Trust and is being extended.
